content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: acacia_door
inventory=[{"type": "magenta_carpet", "quantity": 3, "index": 22}, {"type": "warped_slab", "quantity": 50, "index": 23}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 6, "index": 27}, {"type": "lava_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "wither_skeleton_skull", "quantity": 15, "index": 30}, {"type": "stone_pressure_plate", "quantity": 59, "index": 31}, {"type": "pink_wool", "quantity": 58, "index": 34}, {"type": "red_mushroom_block", "quantity": 64, "index": 42}, {"type": "slime_spawn_egg", "quantity": 50, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft an acacia_door, I need to place 6 acacia_planks in the crafting grid in the shape of a door. I will start by placing one plank in the top left corner (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 27 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: acacia_door
inventory=[{"type": "acacia_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "magenta_carpet", "quantity": 3, "index": 22}, {"type": "warped_slab", "quantity": 50, "index": 23}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 5, "index": 27}, {"type": "lava_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "wither_skeleton_skull", "quantity": 15, "index": 30}, {"type": "stone_pressure_plate", "quantity": 59, "index": 31}, {"type": "pink_wool", "quantity": 58, "index": 34}, {"type": "red_mushroom_block", "quantity": 64, "index": 42}, {"type": "slime_spawn_egg", "quantity": 50, "index": 44}]
thought: Next I will place another plank below the first one (slot 2).
Ok
act: move from slot 27 to slot 2 with quantity 1
